DOC.brief_title: Activity Based Program Improve Quality Life Outcomes Women Diagnosed With Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This research study focus develop implement eight one-week activity camp summer 2012 , 2013 , 2014 woman diagnose cancer . Each camp hold different geographical location : rural ( Renovo , PA ) , suburban ( Gilda 's Club Warminster , PA ) , MD Anderson Camden , urban ( University Sciences Cancer Support Community Philadelphia ) . The focus program allow woman engage activity may engage since diagnosis cancer provide opportunity socially interact communicate individual may encounter difficulty . Quality life information collect , implementation activity program . The main objective demonstrate improve life satisfaction ( evidence gather three consecutive period geographical location Quality Life survey ) . 77 woman recruit three year period . 6 drop 71 complete entire study .
